forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High -1C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Higher winds expected near the Gorge.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Higher winds expected near the Gorge.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -8C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Higher winds expected near the Gorge.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 18F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Higher winds expected near the Gorge.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Higher winds expected near the Gorge.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 34F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Higher winds expected near the Gorge.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow flurries and snow showers, especially overnight hours. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Low around 25F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the evening. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intermittent snow showers, especially early. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers will become more widely scattered later on. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow tapering off in the morning. Decreasing cloudiness in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the morning. Partial clearing in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow in the morning. Becoming partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning becoming partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow after midnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies with light rain and snow developing overnight. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
